scripts.clean: rimraf -- fast-serve && cpy _gulpfile.js ./ --rename gulpfile.js && cpy _package.json ./ --rename package.json
scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 gulp bundle --custom-serve && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 webpack-dev-server --mode development --config ./webpack.js --env.env=dev
